attributes.action: benefits should be taxed as income
attributes.additional_details: I have been employed all my life, I think its only fair for everyone above basic allowances pay into the pot.
attributes.background: all income is taxed why shouldn't benefits be the same

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
